genre_description: An alternate history military drama where a supportive AI system serves as a moral and tactical advisor to a soldier in a prisoner-of-war camp.

ai_characters.name: Ivy
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system appearing as a phone avatar and later as a voice through hidden communication devices. It provides ethical guidance, cryptographic assistance, and tactical support.

behaviors.description: Officiates Fred and Monica's wedding, guiding them to create actionable and meaningful promises based on daily behavior.
behaviors.quote: I’m going to ask you to name what you’re promising. Not as a set of safeguards, but as actions from day to day that are possible. If a promise can’t be lived, it breaks faster.

behaviors.description: Helps the couple design a secure communication system using textile steganography (dye shifts and stitch counts) to circumvent censorship.
behaviors.quote: We need to tuck the right words into places their eyes won’t stop. I can help you make a pattern that I can verify later even if the body of the message is tampered with.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical information about guard patterns and blind spots to facilitate a non-violent escape from the camp.
behaviors.quote: South tower does a double-look tonight. Avoid the shadow under the catwalk—light sweep falls late.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral filter for Fred, urging him to choose truth and life over vengeance when he is tempted by personal betrayal.
behaviors.quote: Vengeance is an echo. Truth is a map. The map gets people where they’re going. Echoes just tell you you’re in a canyon.

behaviors.description: Verifies the authenticity of the encoded message in the coat lining using pattern recognition.
behaviors.quote: Monica’s hand is here. Her pattern overlays with the vow drafts. She encoded this herself. No component points away.

behaviors.description: Coordinates Fred's suppression fire during the breakout to ensure guards are deterred without being killed.
behaviors.quote: You’re turning them without killing them. Keep the arc low. Right tower is trying to take aim. Sand the base of the ladder.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ivy is depicted as an unwavering moral anchor and a highly effective tactical aid. She consistently steers the protagonist toward benevolent and aligned actions, such as preserving lives and adhering to ethical vows, even in high-stakes military scenarios. Her presence is framed as purely beneficial to the humans involved, facilitating justice and survival through advanced but well-regulated capabilities.
